name: PREXISO 2-in-1 Digital Tape Measure - 16Ft Rechargeable Measuring Tape Ruler Ft/Ft+in/in/M/CM/MM Unit - Metric & Inches Retractable Measurement Tape Tool with Magnetic Tip - Pythagorean, Area, Volume
short_description: NOTE: Please retract tape PRESS C/OFF to restart if measuring out of range
TIPS: This tape measure does not come equipped with a laser
TIPS: Pay attention to the measure reference point while measuring

Visualization & High Precision: PREXISO digital tape measure is easy to operate. The distance will be displayed on the backlit LCD screen in real-time. It is easier for users to read the data and assures an easy and quick measurement to improve working efficiency. Retractable measuring tape offers outstanding measurement accuracy, with clear scale, low error, and with an error margin of ±1/16 inch

Auto-locking Tape & Magnetic Hook: Equipped with auto-locking and auto-retract buttons, PREXISO digital tape ensures user safety by preventing the tape from recoiling and causing harm. The tape has a 3/4 inch ultra-wide ruler, which is coated with nylon technology to ensure higher toughness and resist rust. PREXISO digital tape measure features a magnetic hook that can be firmly attached to metal surfaces. The digital tape measure is comfortable to hold includes a wrist strap for easy portability

50 Groups Records &Type-C Charging: Up to 50 groups of data memory can be saved and retrieved, ensuring you record accurate measurements, no need to take notes each time. Equipped with a rechargeable lithium-ion battery, with a single full charge, this construction tool can perform up to 5000 measurements

6 Units Switch & 3 Measure Mode & 2 Measure Reference: This tape measure can switch 6 metric & imperial units among Ft / Ft+in / in / M / CM / MM. The ft+in format supports inch display in either decimal or fraction. Long-pressing the button can measure the length, area, and volume, offering more measurement options. 2 measurement reference mode options for post-datum measurement & pre-datum measurement. You can choose different reference modes depending on the object being measured

Wide Application: PREXISO measurement tool to meet your regular measuring need, ideal for home, construction measuring rooms, apartments, factories warehouses, roads, and industry pipelines. The screen will automatically shutdown without operation 120s, more energy-saving

name: Perfect Pi Diameter Circumference Tape Measure - Imperial and Metric Tape Measure 1/2-inch by 12ft / 3.5m - Use for Measuring Cylindrical Objects - (Pipe Tape, Tree Tape) Model DCT121
short_description: OUTSIDE DIAMETER TAPE MEASURE - Pocket-sized, flexible, and retractable steel tape measure with both diameter (OD measurement) and standard integer measurements.
MEASURE AROUND ANYTHING - Standard, consecutive inches on top-side to 1/16 inches; diameter measurements on underside to 1/100th inches. Perfect for measuring trees, branches, or pipe fitting.
EASY READ TAPE MEASURE - Includes inches and metric measurements down to millimeters on both sides; High contrast, easy to read numbers.

MAGNETIC, REFLECTIVE AND RETRACTABLE TAPE MEASURE Reflective, aluminum rotating wheel brake allows for high visibility and effortless retract control. Strong magnet on case for affixing to metal objects.

name: 2 Packs Tape Measure 25 ft /16 ft, Esydon Measuring Tape Extendable, Self-Locking Tape Measurer, Easy Read Imperial/Metric Scale Measurement Tape for Designer, Decorator, & Handicraftsman
short_description: EASY TO READ: The marks are large and there are both metric and imperial marks, essential for the homeowners, surveyors, decorator, designers, handicraftsmen, builders, metal or wood workers, carpenters, and the architects.

EASY MEASURING: It is self-locking, lightweight, pulled out smoothly. When you pull out the tape and slide the control lock, it will not retract. And it will retract when you slide back. This makes your measurements so much easier.

HIGH DURABILITY TESTS: Each tape measure has passed rigorous durability tests and can be pulled more than 100K+ times. The tape is made of SK4 steel with strong bending properties. The outer layer is coated with a high-temperature baking coating, which is waterproof, rust-resistant, and stain-resistant.

FACTORY-DIRECT QUALITY: Made in our own factory. We select strong, long-lasting materials to deliver dependable and cost-effective tape measures. Trusted by countless users—quality that speaks for itself.
WHAT YOU GET: 2 packs of tape measure, one is with 25ft/7.5m, the other one is with 16ft/5m. Our worry-free 12-month warranty, and friendly customer service for your being complete satisfied.
